title: Frankfort Teen Accidentally Shot, Killed During Christmas Gathering
content:
Frankfort Police are calling the shooting death of a 16-year-old at a Christmas gathering an accident.
On Christmas Day, officers were called to Taylor Ave after a report of a shooting. Family members confirmed that Dnoymar "Denom" Russell was transported to UK hospital with life-threatening injuries stemming from a gunshot wound. The coroner has reported that Russell has died.
Investigators determined that during the Christmas gathering at the home, when the older brother of Russell discovered a loaded firearm and accidentally discharged the weapon, shooting Russell in the head.
No criminal charges have been filed in this case however police are still investigating.
